runs.comm: starts with a back of length ball outside off that is steered to backward point
short and way outside off, a bit of swing away
much closer to the off stump, defended back towards the bowler by Mahela Jayawardene
a touch wider, chopped towards point
attempts the steer once more, again finds the fielder
short of length ball well outside off, too far outside off
this time Jayawardene gets hold of it, length ball well outside off, crashes it past point for a boundary
back of a length ball just outside off, defended to the off side
crashes his first ball for four! Friendly half volley outside off and at good pace, thrashes it past the gap at cover
no mercy! Edwards drops it shorter this time but errs by giving too much width outside off, stands tall and bashes it past the huge gap at point
three out of three! Edwards varies his length again and drops it too full outside off, Dilshan punishes him by driving off the front foot and it scorches past cover
full outside the off stump and driven on the front foot again but Gayle's there at extra cover
loss of concentration there, it was short and wide and Dilshan went for the slash and nearly edged it
three consecutive dot balls, short and chopped hard to the off side, point picks up, end of a terrible over
nicely stopped by Pollard at point, opened the face and steered it and it was to the fielder's left, they pick up a quick single
that was too wide outside the off stump, went for the slash though
that really took off off a good length! Dilshan wanted to bash that straight and the ball gathered pace off the pitch and good carry to the keeper
opens the face of the bat and steers it down to third man
driven on the up and fast towards Pollard at backward point and he fumbled it, Jayawardene sneaks in a run
Rampaul's rewarded for a good over! He gets another ball to kick up off a good length, Dilshan was cramped for room as he tried to steer that away and it took the outside edge to the keeper
starts off with a wide down the leg side to Sangakkara
too straight and he tucks it down to fine leg
gets forward and turns it to the on side
the off break and he gets across and works it with the turn to the on side
full and driven down to mid-on
elegantly done! Tossed up on the leg stump and easily flicked away in the air over midwicket
gets across and drives and Russell dives at cover point and gets a hand to it, does well to gather himself and run after the ball and throw
gets forward and drives him to cover
slashed over backward point but quite safe, it was short and wide and he reached out and slashed it, third man couldn't come across
this was more convincing! Too straight and full on the pads and he nicely chips it over midwicket
a touch short and he times the punch well and finds backward point
bowls it short and wide again and Mahela cuts and beats cover point but there's sweeper cover  to cut it off
lucky to get away with that Rampaul, straight and full on the pads and Sanga fails to whip it away, hit on the pads but outside the line
shorter in length but on the pads and he clips it behind square, Edwards does the mopping near the boundary
tries to dab that past point but Sammy comes in the way
good length outside the off stump and chopped down to cover point
Edwards decides that the bouncer is the way to go but he hits the deck so hard that it clears Ramdin by a mile
the conventional length ball this time and he punches it towards point
too close to cut and he manages to fend it off to point
exquisite timing! Good length outside off and he rides the pace on the ball to punch it effortlessly past the covers, didn't hit it too hard
gives him width and he slaps it past cover, not enough in it to get it to the rope
no turn on that one, shuffles and clips it to the on side
comes round the wicket to sanga, drives a full ball wide of cover
the first proper off break from Narine, spins sharply and he easily tucks it to the leg side
waits for it and clips it with the turn to the on side
spins back into the left-hander and he knocks it back to the bowler
lovely shot! Especially against the spinner, stays back at the crease and punches it with the turn wide of midwicket, that's 1000 T20 international runs for Sangakkara
slightly short and he arches back and dabs it to third man
at this rate they will canter home really quickly, friendly short delivery and he swivels and pulls it behind square, fine leg gave up the chase
moves across the stumps and he pushes it down the track
stays back and punches it down to mid-off, the keeper is up to the stumps
Mahela tried the lap shot over the keeper and didn't come off at all, failed to make contact
gets it to nip back in to tuck him up for room, punched to the off side
slower off the pitch and he dabs it down to point
spins back in slightly and he punches it back to the bowler
inside edge on the drive and it rolls to short fine leg
that's a Mahela special! Premeditated reverse sweep, he knew there was no slip, played it fine to third man
turns it wide of midwicket and he picks up a couple
lucky that Ramdin was wearing a helmet! The off break spun back in sharply from the rough and beat the batsman, hit the keeper's grill
drops it short and he pulls it along the ground to deep midwicket
opens the face of the bat and steers it down to point
that was short and wide and slashed and lucky for Sammy that went straight to point
just short of the rope! It was bowled short and he swiveled at the crease and pulled in front of square, nearly carried over the deep midwicket rope
full on the pads and driven down to long-on
flicked and Gayle does well at short midwicket to cut it off
stays back and clips it with the turn to midwicket
the slower off break, Sanga was beaten as the ball spun away
stabs it to the off side
stays back and punches it down to point
quicker and flatter and tucked away with the turn to the leg side
no turn this time, softly punched towards point
wasted delivery! Down the leg side with the keeper up and the ball clips the pads and goes to fine leg
punches it down to mid-off
bowls it on the pads and it rolls to fine leg
gets a top edge on the sweep and it lands safely, that kind of day for West Indies
slightly streaky! Makes room to a length ball and lofts it just over mid-off's reach
drifts on the pads and he clips it down to fine leg
gives him too much width outside the off stump and he slaps it straight to sweeper cover
drops it short and it hurries onto him and he stays back and defends
it's Mahela's day today, once again he makes room to unsettle the bowler, carves it just over Gayle's reach at extra cover and it races away
fuller delivery on middle and he clips it towards midwicket
brings up his fifty! Makes room and slashes on the up and drops short of backward point, sneaks a single
stays back and punches it wide of extra cover for a couple
slower ball wide down the leg side and Sanga tried to heave that away but was frustrated he couldn't put it away
waits for it and dabs it down to third man
bang! He bowls it too short and Jayawardene rocks back and gives it a whack over deep midwicket, clean strike
fuller delivery and he dabs it down to third man
makes a lot of room to heave it away and gets an inside edge past the stumps to fine leg
starts off with a juicy half volley from round the wicket, gets under the bounce and he lofts it crisply through the line to long-off
another "hit me" ball, drops it too short and he had the time to swivel and pull it cleanly down to deep square leg
stays back and punches it towards cover point
slower ball outside the off stump and he swings and misses, the keeper fumbles
Jayawardene at his best! Back to his silent-killing best, makes room and cheekily dabs the ball past the keeper and down to third man, really dents a bowler's confidence
nearly finished it off! Pitched up outside off and he lofts crisply down to wide long-off, one bounce and four
gets across and pushes it to the off side
overthrow to seal the win! Sangakkara came down the track and chipped it to short extra cover who flung himself to his left and couldn't pluck it, the throw to the bowler's end was wide
